alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 10:33PM MST until January 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range, Southern Gila Foothills/Mimbres Valley and Eastern Black Range Foothills Counties. * WHEN...From noon Monday to 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
